description: Making your skin look healthy and beautiful while improving your overall wellbeing is our passion and profession. If you need a "quick fix" for your skin or your concern is to achieve healthy and glowing everyday look - we are here at The Beauty Studio to help you.SpecialtiesSkin Care Treatments - Dermalogica:Detailed skin analysis with home care prescription, recommendations and tips - free of charge.Classic "Rebirth", Age-smart skin treatments, Acne prone skin, Express Facials, Eye treatment.Syneron - Skin Rejuvenation, Laser Acne Treatment and post acne scaring, Skin Tightening - Non surgical facelift. Massagecertified, holistic or registered (RMT) Eyelash careTinting (Reflectocil) or Eyelash extensions (Misencil) Laserhair removal - Laser Diode system Yogaprivate and small classes with best Toronto teachers

reviews.title: Great skin care advice & laser treatments
text: Took the advice of a friend who has been going to this studio for years and so glad I did! I’ve had numerous facials and laser removal sessions with Ana and I couldn’t be happier with the service, expertise and results. I’ve tried out several other estheticians and salons in the past but I’m glad to have finally found one I can trust - will be a customer of Ana’s at this studio for life! Highly recommend to anyone who is looking for honest advice and friendly service.

reviews.title: Incredible service
text: Their service is amazing! Anna is very professional and beyond good at her job! I fully recommend their services and a very good price comparing to other studios in TO.
5 ⭐️ plus

reviews.title: Facial
text: The Studio is very clean. They are very kind and friendly. I am very happy with Ana. She is the best. Can not wait to see you

reviews.title: Absolute ANGEL!!
text: I have gotten my eyelashes done by various technicians before, but Nataliya is by far one of the best in town. She helped me pick up the best type of lashes and thickness that would compliment my face and personality. She was so gentle and nice while applying my lashes. I have had them on for almost 2.5 weeks now and they are still going strong. Nataliya is the real deal - just love her :)

reviews.title: Amazing soul
text: Nataliya isn't just a wonderful dermatologist who helped me clear my skin from acne and give it a fresh lustrous glow - she is also a very understanding and kind person who cares about You and your results! Can highly recommend a visit to The Beauty Studio for anyone who wish to see a skin therapist!

reviews.title: Amazing Studio
text: I have been going to Beauty Studio for a couple of years now to get regular facials.  Nataliya and her staff are amazing.  They consistently give great facials and professional advice for your skin.  Thank you!

reviews.title: Excellent
text: Nataliya is amazing. She is very knowledgeable and friendly. The studio is beautifully decorated, well equipped and very clean. I am looking forward to coming here for my treatments needs.

reviews.title: She has the touch!
text: Wonderful facial. Relaxing, professional and luxurious products. Nataliya is very knowledgable and experienced. I am looking forward to going back very soon for more fantastic treatments!

reviews.title: Best experience ever!
text: Nataliya is a high professional, an artist and she helps you to figure out and to understand what treatment would be the best for you. I learned a lot! and last but not least..a warm and friendly person. Do it, you are worth it!

reviews.title: Great Place
text: Beautiful Place, Great experience with services, the staff is really kind. They know how to take care of their employees and customers.
Will definitely come back :) Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Good service
text: The Beauty Studio is a very nice place to go for your treatments. It's not over priced, clean and has a good location for those who live on the west side of Toronto.
Natalia (the owner and esthetician) is very professional. She is always on time and cares about her clients.

reviews.title: Excellent spa experience
text: This spa is well worth a visit. The owner Nataliya, is extremely knowledgeable and obviously loves what she does. She took her time answering all of my questions and explaining the process (I had the skin rejuvenation treatment). I never felt rushed. She also gave me some very good tips about skin care. She informed me about her product line, but never put pressure on me to purchase. This was really important to me as I have been to other spas where pressure is applied to buy a lot of products. The whole experience was excellent. I will be back in a few weeks for more treatments and to buy some products.
I highly recommend this spa.

reviews.title: Highly Recommend!!!!!
text: I highly recommend anyone looking for a great aesthetician to visit "The Beauty Studio" in the Junction. Nataliya is very knowledgeable, well trained and professional. I decide to have 6 treatments of the "Skin Tightening  ReFirme". I'm thrilled with the results, my skin is much firmer, smoother, and I have such a radiant glow. The Beauty Studio's prices are excellent! It's a very wonderful relaxing spa to go to. Five Stars From Me!!!

reviews.title: the perfect yelash extensions
text: I came to Nataliya with only a few eyelashes left on my eyes after having a bad experience. I was very happy to find her because she offers the best service for a very reasonable price. I couldn't be any happier with my new eyelash extensions. I have been to two other places and neither compare. If you are looking for someone who is professional, friendly, knowledgeable and experienced I highly, highly recommend the beauty studio!

reviews.title: very good experience in Toronto
text: My friend and I walked into this spa last weekend. We got lucky and they took us in without an appointment.

Last weekend I was visiting a friend in Toronto. We were walking in the Junction and happened to walk into the Beauty Studio. I was very impressed with their friendliness and services. I found  prices are reasonable as well. I had my skin analysis and microdermabrasion treatment. It was great! Definitely coming back. I wish the were places like this in Hamilton.

reviews.title: Great place and exellent service, but very hard to book
text: I booked my Chemical peeling and the treatment itself was very well done - not only very relaxing, but I got my eyes opened on my all skin regime - very educational, tons of small tips that actually make a lot of sence.
But at the time of booking I was hoping to get my appointment next day, but they were booked and I got a spot only the next week, which is not quite convinient for my last minute life style.

reviews.title: Best Service Yet!!
text: Over the past three months I was extremely stressed and it started to show on my face. I had developed acne, and the scarring was so extreme that I was embarrassed to go out and no amount of makeup looked good to cover the scars. I went to the Beauty Studio for a solution and the esthetician there Nataliya Patriki was so amazing and she introduced me to some amazing Dermalogica products. I used the Medibac collection which is for acne prone skin. I used the Clearing wash in the morning and the Microfoliant rice enzyme scrub which was extremely gentle for the skin. I followed that my applying clearing mattifier which was so gentle and applied so smoothly on my face and prevented breakouts during the day. I then applied Active moist to retain the moisture in my skin, and it was oil free which I loved. Following that I applied the Sun screen to protect my skin. At night I using the clearing wash, then the Microfoliant, and followed it by the gentle cream exfoliant which penetrated to the deeper layers of my skin, then I used a sebum clearing clay masque to pull the oil out of my skin. To prevent breakouts at night I used cleaning gel, and followed it by Active moist to lock in moisture. This routine really helped me to control my acne.

Now the issue of scarring was  really lowering my self esteem so Nataliya recommended a few sessions of photo facial which uses lazer beam to penetrate to the deeper layers of the skin and regenerate new cells. On my first session, my pigmented skin became darker, and over a couple of days it crusted and the dead skin fell off. I noticed the same pattern and lighter and brighter skin formed underneath the pigmented skin. I was extremely trilled with the results I have more even luminant skin. Although its not 100% My skin has dramatically changed for the better over the last few weeks, and Nataliya was so amazing and patient. I really recommend her salon The Beauty Studio for anyone who has the same concerns, you will feel comfortable and at home.

reviews.title: Best SPA in Toronto!!
text: This is a unique combination of professionalism, style, friendliness!! You feel like you are the only one client they have- total attention!! And I haven't seen such friendly prices for a while. The treatment that I used to pay 250$ in Downtown here cost 130$ and it was even longer and more thorough.
The only problem is that if you want appointment with senior specialist, you might have to book it in advance. I guess it's another proof if how popular she is.
And i was there with a friend- skin bar was a lot of fun!!!!

reviews.title: I want to come back for this service again, again and again.
text: Natalya offers excellent service. She is very knowledgable and professional.  Laser treatments are amazing. Skin looks 10 years younger just before your eyes. My favorite part is before and after when you can compare half face's done to another half face's not done yet.  I would recomend her to anyone who is looking for an excellent treatment and decent price. And her new place is beautiful. It's good to have a girls night out or birthday parties.

reviews.title: The opposite of a chain franchise!
text: I heard that soon they are going to offer babysitting services. The receptionist will watch your kid while you are gtiing your treatments done.  How cool is that?

reviews.title: the most professional skin care I ever had
text: I've been with Nataliya for 2 years now. She is very professional and passionate about what she is doing. My friends now compliment my skin and I am proud to refer them to Nataliya. Thank you!
New location is just amazing! Now they have this spectacular skin bar and I can't wait to have my birthday party there!

reviews.title: Excellent Facial and Laser Skin Rejuv Experience
text: Natalya is a skilled professional, who makes you comfortable and relaxed. I was very anxious about Skin Laser Rejuvenation and Natalya was very gentle, the results - my skin is glowing and no brown spots after 1 visit!
Highlly Reccomended!

reviews.title: Toronto's Finest Skin Therapist
text: Nataliya is by far the best skin therapist I have ever worked with. For years I have struggled with breakouts and overall skin problems into adulthood and have always faced disappointing results. I thought there would never be an end to my skin challenges. Then a dear friend recommended The Beauty Studio as she experienced such amazing results with Nataliya first hand. I have never looked back. Nataliya is honest and provides superior expertise and knowledge of the face and body. I have never had such superior results and am so thankful to Nataliya for changing my skin and my life.

reviews.title: Best treatments
text: Nataliya at the Beauty Studio Spa is very passionate and dedicated towards providing the best, most objective and thorough treatments and recommendations for her patients.

Over the past year I have devleoped such trust in her recommendation for my skincare and she always makes herself as available as possible to accomodate your schedule.  I can tell you with confidence that money is not the sole driving factor behind her practice, as she wants her clients to be satisfied and see true results first and foremost.  Through both a shift in quality skincare products and appropriate treatments, I have seen very noticeable improvements in my skin.  I would recommend her to anyone.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
text: I have been going to Nataliya for about a year now to have my lashes done. I have had them done at a few other places and Nataliya does the best job by far!!!! She really does an amazing job on them every time and I constantly get asked where I got them done. I don't let anybody else do them now. Highly highly recommend going to her for lashes.

reviews.title: SKIN TREATMENTS
text: Hi Guys,
I have been a client of the Beauty Studio for a while. I know Nataliya as a professional and knowledgeable specialist of the Skin care.
All the time she offers to her clients beautiful smiling, good price and super service with good result for men and women.

I have tried so many similar studios in the past and none of them could not satisfy my needs. At the Beauty Studio you are going to find everything what you need to look better and feel rejuvenated in your own skin.
I do recommend it Nataliya's the Skin Treatment to everyone, especially to guys.
Believe me, you wont be disappointed and you are going to look  ooolaaa-laaa.
Mr. I.D.

reviews.title: The absolute best!
text: Nataliya and the Beauty Studio are the absolute best. I started going in July for my acne and brown spots and Nataliya put me at ease from the start. She did a very thorough skin analysis and pinpointed what I needed to do to get my skin looking and functioning better. She is very knowledgeable about skin, skin conditions and products. She is also personable, easy going and does not push products or services. The salon is clean and very cute!

I have to add that it was at my very first appointment that Nataliya spotted an abnormal mole on the side of my face and recommended I get it checked at the doctors. I did, and I had to have it removed as it was abnormal! She very well could have saved my life! I cannot say enough. I have been getting extractions and skin rejuvenation done. The tone and texture of my skin has improved dramatically. My brown spots are almost gone and I look forward to looking beautiful on my wedding day :)
I drive 50 minutes to the Beauty Studio because the service and prices are the best!

reviews.title: What a year!
text: I have been receiving treatments from Nataliya at The Beauty Studio for almost a year and a half. It was 5 months before my wedding when I walked into the Beauty Studio for the first time in search of perfect and flawless skin for my big day. I shared with her at the time that I wanted to start the birth control pill just to make sure that I didn't have any breakouts on my wedding day.  After analyzing my skin, she reassured me that I didn't need the birth control pill to achieve flawless and breakout-free skin.  I entrusted her fully with my skin and started receiving facials from her as well as following her skin regimen advice at home.  My skin on my wedding day was perfect! Even before my wedding day, friends and family started commenting on how beautiful my skin looked. I also had my eyelashes done with Nataliya and they looked stunning and very natural. I was blessed with getting pregnant with my daughter soon after my wedding.  If it wasn't for Nataliya giving me a medication-free solution for my skin, I might have still be trying to get pregnant till this day! Thank you Nataliya for the beautiful skin and my daughter!

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
text: I have been going to see Nataliya for around 2 years for my eyelashes she does a  fantastic   job they look so natural and I get complements all the time  .I am always very impressed by the cleanliness  of   beauty studio and  how professional Nataliya is.Her prices are very reasonable and she carries the Dermalogica  skin care line which has given outstanding  results to my skin and by far the best skin care line on the market .I will carry on been a loyal client it is well worth the 40 minute commute from were I live !

reviews.title: Pamper yourself
text: I have been visiting Natalia for over six month, i enjoy facials and eye lash extensions. She is very knowledgeable and professional. My skin is glowing like never before. And i love love dermalogica line she carries :)
Enjoy ladies and gents.

reviews.title: Proud to have my personal and BEST Skin Therapist!
text: I was always very advanced skin care user - did facials since teenage almost every month. And I always had a feeling that something is missing, that's why I was keep searching and searching. Until I tried The Beauty Studio. Since last year that is the only place I trust my skin and I don't think I will ever try anything else any more. This is not what you might expect - Natalie is not esthetician, no fooling around! Her treatments are not just bringing you results, she will give you a full workshop how to take care of your skin properly. My teenage son even started to use cleanser after his facial. So if you are desperate like I was and seriously need results - I highly recommend!!!!
